import{backendLookup}from'../lookup';export function apiPostCreate(newPost,callback){backendLookup("POST","/posts/create/",callback,{tweet:newPost});}//method is post, endpoint is /posts/create, data is tweet
export function apiPostAction(postId,action,callback){var data={id:postId,action:action};backendLookup("POST","/posts/action/",callback,data);}export function apiPostDetail(postId,callback){backendLookup("GET","/posts/".concat(postId,"/"),callback);}export function apiPostList(username,callback){var endpoint="/posts/";if(username){endpoint="/posts/?username=".concat(username);}backendLookup("GET",endpoint,callback);}
